Run MCMC Inference Simulation

Source: R/running_inference.R
inf_run.Rd

Generates synthetic incidence data if required, sets up MCMC parameters and priors, defines model comparison functions, and runs the MCMC process.

Usage

inf_run(
  model,
  param_inputs,
  control_params,
  params_to_estimate,
  proposal_matrix,
  adaptive_params,
  start_values,
  noise = FALSE,
  seed = 24,
  month_unequal_days = FALSE,
  dates,
  synthetic = TRUE,
  incidence_df = NULL,
  save_trajectories = TRUE,
  rerun_n = Inf,
  rerun_random = FALSE,
  param_priors = NULL,
  override_priors = NULL,
  n_years_warmup = 3,
  obs_config
)

Arguments

model

The model object used for simulation and inference.

param_inputs

List of input parameters for the model, including temperature, decay, and coverage details.

control_params

Control parameters for the MCMC process including chain, burn-in, and step counts.

params_to_estimate

Character vector of parameters to estimate during inference.

proposal_matrix

Covariance matrix for the MCMC proposal distribution.

adaptive_params

Parameters for adaptive proposal distribution if adaptive MCMC is used.

start_values

Initial parameter values for starting the MCMC chains.

noise

Logical; if TRUE, adds noise to the synthetic incidence data.

seed

Numeric; sets the random seed for reproducibility.

month_unequal_days

Logical; indicates if monthly data has unequal days.

dates

Vector of start and end dates for the simulation period.

synthetic

Logical; if TRUE, generates synthetic incidence data.

incidence_df

Data frame of observed incidence data if not synthetic.

save_trajectories

Logical; if TRUE, saves MCMC trajectories.

rerun_n

Numeric; frequency for re-running MCMC proposals.

rerun_random

Logical; if TRUE, re-runs MCMC randomly.

param_priors

Optional prior list for MCMC parameters.

n_years_warmup

Number of years to run prior to start of observation period.

obs_config

A named list specifying observation model configuration. Use make_obs_config() to construct this.

Value

A list containing MCMC results, including posterior samples, fixed parameters, priors, and incidence data.
